resources.string: This app will automatically mute the \'music\' audio stream on your device, once it enters silent/vibration mode (and restore its volume when going to ringer mode again).\nThis way, even music and video apps as well as most games will be muted while in silent/vibration mode.\nOf course, you can overwrite the set volume at any time using the volume buttons of your device.
The app needs to be enabled as \'notification listener\' to detect changes in the priority mode setting. Please click here to enable the notification listener service.
The app won\'t do anything if the notification listener is not enabled!
Don\'t restore volume if changed during DND
